about.title: Her Wealth
about.intro: A modern wealth platform empowering women
about.intro2: to grow, protect, and own their financial freedom.
about.story1: I'm Elise Chong. During the MCO period, I stepped into the world of finance and wealth management. That moment, I realized that wealth is not just about cold, hard numbers â€” it's about the wisdom deeply connected to our everyday lives.
about.story2: I've seen how many people worry about money and feel uncertain about the future. That's why I've made it my mission to use my experience and expertise to guide others toward a more stable, confident, and fulfilling financial journey.
about.story3: This belief inspired me to create my own brand â€” HW â€” Her Wealth. It's a financial growth platform designed for women, empowering them to take control of their finances, and create a life of true independence, abundance, and freedom.
about.wealthDefinition1b: It's about freedom â€” the freedom to choose your path, the courage to live with purpose, and the power to shape a future that truly belongs to you.
about.wealthDefinition2: At Her Wealth, we believe financial growth should be empowering, inspiring, and deeply personal â€” a journey we walk together toward confidence, clarity, and independence.
about.cert3Desc: Staying current with industry best practices

trust.title: Why You Can
trust.cert2Desc: years of hands-on financial planning expertise
trust.cert3Desc: continuously learning and adapting to deliver what's best for you
trust.philosophyText1: I believe every meaningful financial plan begins with understanding you â€” your goals, your values, and what truly matters in your life.
trust.philosophyText2: It's never about selling products. It's about crafting a personalized wealth strategy that grows with you.
trust.philosophyText3: Transparent. Professional. Genuine. No matter where you are on your journey, I'll always be on your side â€” that's my promise to you.
trust.wealthDefinition1b: It's about freedom â€” the freedom to choose your path, the courage to live with purpose, and the power to shape a future that truly belongs to you.
trust.wealthDefinition2: At Her Wealth, we believe financial growth should be empowering, inspiring, and deeply personal â€” a journey we walk together toward confidence, clarity, and independence.
trust.testimonial1: Elise is wonderful. She took the time to really listen and answered every question I had. She completely changed how I think about wealth management and financial planning.
trust.testimonial2: I'm so grateful to Elise for helping me create a comprehensive wealth plan for my family. I finally feel confident about our future.
trust.testimonial3: Elise is professional, detail-oriented, and truly reliable. She doesn't just give you a plan and disappearâ€”she's there for ongoing support.

services.title: How I Can
services.subtitle: I don't just talk about finance â€” I help you find clarity and calm around money, so your wealth aligns with your values and supports the life you want to live.

service1.title: Family

service1.scenario: For young couples or parents who want peace of mind and a clear plan.

service2.title: Investment

service2.scenario: For professionals and entrepreneurs who value sustainable progress.

service3.title: Retirement
